ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Assignment_Agreement__c), OR( PRIORVALUE(Assigned_to_Client__c), Assigned_to_Client__c ), NOT( $Permission.Customer_Assignment_Agreement_Management ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: We should not change a customer's assignment agreement after it has been set and Assigned to Client is checked, unless you have the Customer Assignment Agreement Management permission
